pkgmetadata.longdescription: ==================== bhoelHelper module====================Some helper modules used in my other modules.Installation============pip install bhoelHelperAvailability============The latest version should be available at my `GitLab<https://gitlab.com/berhoel/python/bhoelHelper.git>`_ repository, thepackage is avaliable at `pypi<https://pypi.org/project/bhoelHelper/>`_ via ``pip installbhoelHelper``.Documentation=============Documentation for the project is avaliable `here <https://python.h√∂llmanns.de/bhoelHelper/>`_.
